text: @DonaldJTrumpJr @realDonaldTrump It's as if the Dems Wanted Coronavirus to spread to the US. Dems are probably upset that this gives more credence to the HuaWei ban from Western nations, proposed by @realdonaldtrump . HuaWei 5G means total control over client countries. Dems know this. It's #theRedThread
